properties.name: db_url
properties.description: Url of database (fully qualified in format jdbc:postgresql://<url>).

properties.name: test_driver_firefox
properties.description: Path to gecko driver for selenium tests.

properties.name: test_driver
properties.description: Type of webdriver to use for selenium tests. Supported drivers: geckodriver, chromedriver.
